content.rendered:
Shake off that negative energy with DAGMAT® body aligning mat that’ll give you the clarity and peace of mind you’ve been looking for!

Dag Training Mat helps align your body so you can stretch out perfectly align optimize yourself to absorb all of the health and mental benefits that come with a century-old tried & true practice.

This mat is a stress-relieving practice and also makes a perfect gift for that sedentary person in your life who could desperately use a little push in the right direction!

  • Printed Logo
  • Soft Cushion
  • Double Layer Padded
